title: The Haunted Mansion: The Phantom's Madrigal by David Feuling
description:
Been wanting to do some tales from the Haunted Mansion for years now and a huge thanks to all the authors and voice talent that helped me bring this to life. Corpse Husband, DeZombified's Kenny Dreadful and Miss Stereo, Myuu and of course David Feuling for writing the first episode.

The Cast

Corpse Husband: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFNTq9XKHDNy_1-2lL0kqCg/
DeZombified: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLHfVhkT0oU8rFFmpvcwo2w/
The Author: https://www.reddit.com/user/DHF_Dissociation
Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64zJgQMfL2w
Read along!:

Aminooo!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.narvii.amino.x220474164&hl=en_US & https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mrcreepypasta-amino/id1142706153?mt=8

Check out my new books! A collection of Creepypastas compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends!
